det(A) =
⏐⏐⏐⏐⏐⏐⏐⏐⏐
a11 a12 ... a 1n
a21 a22 ... a 2n
... ... ...
an1 an2 ... a nn
⏐⏐⏐⏐⏐⏐⏐⏐⏐
. (4.1)
The determinant of a square matrix A∈Rn×n is a function that maps A determinant
